about.title: About Dr. Anand

With a patient-first approach and commitment to excellence, Dr. Anand has successfully treated thousands of patients.

testimonials.name: Rajesh Kumar
testimonials.text: Dr. Anand performed my gallbladder surgery with such precision. The recovery was quick and I'm back to normal life. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.text: Excellent doctor with great expertise. He explained everything clearly and the laparoscopic procedure was painless. Very satisfied with the care.

testimonials.name: Amit Patel
testimonials.text: Best gastro surgeon in the city. Professional, caring, and highly skilled. My hernia surgery was successful and recovery was smooth.
